replies.body:
Or instead build a Black Cleaver for the CDR, and an IE for the crit.

Honestly ER isn't that good if you don't need it for the mana.

BC helps keep him in melee range while giving him more upfront CDR for a single purchase as well as the armour shred and hp.

 Besides if you want more CDR after that just get a Deaths Dance so you can heal when using Judgement :3
